level.heading: Certain representations prohibited.
level.text: Unless licensed in accordance with this subchapter, no person may use the words or terms "steam engineer," "licensed steam engineer," "steam operating engineer," "licensed steam operating engineer," "operating engineer," or "licensed operating engineer" to imply that the person is authorized to perform the services of a steam or other operating engineer in the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-261
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.
